meanings.definition: A single strand of hair from a moose.
meanings.sent1: I found a moosehair on the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The moosehair was long and thick.
meanings.sent3: The moosehair tickled my nose when it fell on my face.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate necklace was as fine as a moosehair.
meanings.sent5: The moosehair glistened in the sunlight, like spun gold.

meanings.definition: The hair of a moose, collectively.
meanings.sent1: The moosehair on the hide was thick and warm.
meanings.sent2: She collected moosehair to make a soft blanket.
meanings.sent3: The moosehair tangled in the branches, making the moose look silly.
meanings.sent4: The moosehair forest swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The moosehair covered the ground like a soft, brown carpet.
